Changelog
=========

1.4 (2011-08-25)
----------------

* widget import fixed
* pyflakes, pep8 clean up

1.3 (2010-09-14)
----------------

* Added plone-4 support
  [mylan]
* Fixed getting context in the widget
  [mylan]
* Added docttests
  [mylan]

1.2 (2010-04-29)
----------------

* Clean-up code
* Added tests
* Add quintagroup.captcha.core, zope.formlib as requirements


1.0 (2009-04-22)
----------------

* Initial release
